DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: There is no difference between pentacam scheimpflug system and locs3 in grading of cataract. Major aims: 1. research the efficiency of pentacam scheimpflug system in lens density measurment. 2. To compare the pentacam with the locs3 in grading of cataract.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Comparison Between Pentacam and locs3
DOC.criteria: cataract patient age>18 pregnant women any disease of the eye except for cataract patients who are ineligible by law to take decisions by themselves.patients who have a custodian.
